lead_paragraph: Bill Britton won his second consecutive New Jersey P.G.A. Championship yesterday when Frank Esposito Jr. three-putted from 3 feet for a bogey on the final hole. Britton sank a 5-foot putt to save par on the 18th green at Manasquan River Golf Club in Brielle, and then sat back and watched Esposito miss a short but slippery birdie putt to win the $57,000 tournament. Esposito ran his first putt 6 feet past the hole. He then missed his par putt coming back up the hill to give Britton a one-shot victory. Britton had a final round one-under-par 71 and finished at four-under 212.
